column4: anyone know why i cant login to ubuntu? the screen stays blank right before i get to the login screen??
anyone know why my screen stays blank right before the login screen??
Has your xserver log shown any errors?
i dont know how to check anything.. i dont know how to get a terminal or anything.
You can get onto the console by pressing CTRL + ALT + F1to6
You can get onto the console by pressing CTRL + ALT + F1to6
ahh, thanks
what should i check to see whats wrong? any suggestions?
anyone know what i do to reset the login manager settings?
is there a hidden .folder i can delete in home?
mike22e: Go back to the black screen, press control + alt + F7, then press control + alt + backspace. Do any error messages show?
im in console now.. how do i go back to restart X?
What does your screen say now?
nothing, just at a console.
sudo gdm
it says already in GDM..
ctrl+alt+f7, then ctrl + alt+backspace
yeah, it doesnt show any error. just blank screen with loading cursor. like before the login screen, usually it does that for 1 second. but now it stays like that forever.. loading..
sorry, im really not an expert on ubuntu, just your average user. I dont know what to suggest
anyone know what i do to reset the login manager settings?
perhaps sudo apt-get remove gdm , then sudo apt-get install gdm
